user.title: 🎵 Add WiiM Speaker
user.description:
Let's set up your WiiM audio device! Choose how you'd like to find your speaker:

{message}

data_description.discovery_mode: Automatic discovery will scan your network for WiiM devices. Manual setup requires you to know your device's IP address.

manual.title: 🏠 Manual Device Setup
manual.description:
Enter your WiiM device's IP address. You can find this in your router's admin panel or the WiiM Home app under Device Settings → Network Info.

{tip}

data_description.host: Example: {example} — Make sure your device is powered on and connected to the same network as Home Assistant

discovery.title: 🔍 Found {count} WiiM Device(s)
discovery.description:
Great! We found these WiiM devices on your network. Select the one you want to add:

{tip}

data_description.no_devices_manual: Click continue to enter your device's IP address manually

upnp.title: 🎶 Select Your WiiM Speaker
upnp.description: Choose a speaker from the discovered devices, or set up manually if yours isn't listed.

confirm.title: ✅ Ready to Add Device
confirm.description: Perfect! We'll now add your WiiM device to Home Assistant. It will appear in your Media tab and can be controlled through automations.

abort.already_configured: 🔄 This WiiM device is already set up in Home Assistant.
abort.cannot_connect: ❌ Could not connect to your WiiM device.
abort.no_host: ⚠️ Please provide a device IP address.
abort.no_devices: 🔍 No WiiM devices found on your network.

error.cannot_connect:
❌ Connection failed. Please check:
• The IP address is correct
• Your WiiM device is powered on
• Both devices are on the same network
• No firewall is blocking the connection
error.already_configured: This WiiM device is already configured in Home Assistant. Check your Media tab or Devices & Services page.
error.no_devices:
🔍 No WiiM devices found automatically. This can happen if:
• Devices are on a different network segment
• Network discovery is disabled
• Firewall is blocking discovery

Try manual setup instead!
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or check the Home Assistant logs for details.

init.title: ⚙️ WiiM Device Settings
init.description: Fine-tune how your WiiM device works with Home Assistant:

data_description.status_update_interval: How often to check speaker status (1-60 seconds). Lower = faster updates but more network traffic.
data_description.volume_step_percent: Volume change when using +/- buttons (1-50%). Smaller steps = finer control.
data_description.enable_group_entity: Create virtual group controller for multiroom setups. Enables controlling all grouped speakers together.
data_description.debug_logging: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting. Turn off after solving issues to reduce log size.

options.discover: 🔍 Automatic — Find devices on my network
options.manual: ✍️ Manual — I know the IP address

play_preset.name: Play Preset
play_preset.description: Play a preset station or playlist (buttons 1-6 on speaker).

sync_time.name: Sync Time
sync_time.description: Synchronize speaker clock with Home Assistant time.
